name: An RTP callback is successfully received
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Error from callback, expected 200 got 400
assert 400 == 200
 +  where 400 = <Response [400]>.status_code

labels.name: story
labels.value: Service provider sends a callback referred to an RTP
